title: Programming-Based Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program Using STEM-Integrated Active Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematics and Computer Utilization Skills, Fundamental Understanding of Programming
context.additional_context: A STEM-integrated course for medical/legal/technical professionals to cultivate real-world problem-solving skills, emphasizing collaborative learning via low-code platforms in BYOD settings

learning_goals: Learners can design one prototype of a mobile application that solves public health issues (nutrition/hygiene) using mathematical modeling.
Learners can implement and debug simple programming logic using low-code development tools.
Learners can effectively communicate with team members during the STEM project development process through non-face-to-face collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
